body_html: I am unfamiliar with what "replica_sync" option you are referring to. Normally when you use parameter servers, your workers will operate asynchronously, with a distribution strategy or without. I'm also unfamiliar with what you are referring to when you say "BSP" or "SSP".

body: I am unfamiliar with what "replica_sync" option you are referring to. Normally when you use parameter servers, your workers will operate asynchronously, with a distribution strategy or without. I'm also unfamiliar with what you are referring to when you say "BSP" or "SSP".
